class.name: gd_Storage_OpenMode
class.brief_description: Specifies opening modes for a file.
class.description:
This class provides an enum specifying opening modes for a file, as defined in Open CASCADE's Storage_OpenMode.
- VSNone: No mode is specified. - VSRead: The file is open for reading operations. - VSWrite: The file is open for writing operations. - VSReadWrite: The file is open for both reading and writing operations.
Note: This is an enum wrapper for use in Godot GDExtension. No methods or properties are exposed other than the enum itself.

constant.name: VSRead
constant.description: The file is open for reading operations.

constant.name: VSWrite
constant.description: The file is open for writing operations.

constant.name: VSReadWrite
constant.description: The file is open for both reading and writing operations.
